item.title: National Party selects Emma Mellow as Auckland Central candidate
item.description:
Emma Mellow has been named as the National Party's candidate for Auckland Central, vying for the seat left vacant by the party's former deputy leader Nikki Kaye.
Mellow will take on Labour's Helen White ...
